Definition at line 91 of file io.h.

#define MakeOpenFile ( obj,
fp   ) 
Value:
do {\
    if (RFILE(obj)->fptr) {\
        rb_io_close(obj);\
        rb_io_fptr_finalize(RFILE(obj)->fptr);\
        RFILE(obj)->fptr = 0;\
    }\
    (fp) = 0;\
    RB_IO_FPTR_NEW(fp);\
    RFILE(obj)->fptr = (fp);\
} while (0)

#define RB_IO_FPTR_NEW ( fp   ) 
Value:
do {\
    (fp) = ALLOC(rb_io_t);\
    (fp)->fd = -1;\
    (fp)->stdio_file = NULL;\
    (fp)->mode = 0;\
    (fp)->pid = 0;\
    (fp)->lineno = 0;\
    (fp)->pathv = Qnil;\
    (fp)->finalize = 0;\

    RB_IO_BUFFER_INIT((fp)->rbuf);\

    (fp)->writeconv = NULL;\
